select * from etms_item_student where item_id = #{itemId} and user_id = #{userId}
mapper.delete: delete from etms_item_student where item_id = #{itemId} and user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into etms_item_student values(null, #{userId}, #{itemId}, 0, 0, null, null, null, null, null, null)
mapper.update:
update etms_item_student set apply_status = #{status} where apply_status = '0'
and student_id = #{stuId}
